comments.author: satashi_nokamato
comments.body: The next hexadecimal key holds 6.6 BTC ,  how can you pay 8 for 6.6?  Best thing you can do is to guess the key yourself and save 1.4 BTC.  You have around 2**66 different numbers to try,  even if you halve that you'd still need to try 2**65 numbers one by one.

comments.author: apogio
comments.body: The numbers you have mentioned are the ones that have been found on this puzzle set.Is there really a reason for this post?I mean, do you really suppose that anyone would find the next hex number and instead of grabbing the 6.6 BTC they would tell you the number because you promised to give them 8 BTC ?
